note: id field is used when checking answer for a quiz, as the answer is not sent to the client

type.note: Options include: 'mc' (Multiple Choice), 'multipic' (Multi-Picture), 'fillin' (Fill in the Blank), 'essay' (Essay), 'dragdrop' (Drag and Drop Categories), 'multicheck' (Multiple Check), 'ranking' (Ranking), 'match' (Matching)

options.note: Required for most quiz types, exceptions are: 'truefalse', 'fillin', 'essay'. Generally an array of strings, currently exceptions are: 'multipic', 'dragdrop'
